title: Create playful single-page ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù with dodging No button and reveal-on-Yes image

requirements.text: Create a single-page React UI that reproduces the provided ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù layout: centered heading text ‚ÄúWill you always be mine?‚Äù, a two-button row (Yes / No) in a constrained container, and an initially-empty output area below.

quotes: Will you always be mine?

acceptanceCriteria: On initial page load, the heading, two buttons, and an empty output area are visible and centered vertically and horizontally.
The button row is contained within a centered region approximately equivalent to max-width ~400px and supports button repositioning within that region.

requirements.text: Implement styling in Tailwind/CSS to match the provided visual design: Comic Sans-like playful typography, warm yellow/orange diagonal gradient background, large heading with subtle shadow, rounded pill buttons with drop shadows, and the output image with rounded corners and glow shadow.
acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a warm diagonal gradient background (similar to #fceabb ‚Üí #f8b500).
Heading appears large and prominent with a subtle shadow.
Yes button is pink/red with a shadow; No button is green with its own shadow; both have hover effects (color change + slight scale).
When the image is shown, it appears responsive (max width ~90% of viewport), rounded, and with a warm glow shadow.

requirements.text: Implement the interactive behavior for the ‚ÄúNo, never!‚Äù button: when the cursor enters the button, it moves to a random position within its button container; when clicked, it shows an alert with the exact English text: ‚ÄúHaha! You can't say no! Gotta be mine! üòú‚Äù.
acceptanceCriteria: Hovering (mouseenter) over the No button causes it to jump to a new random position within the bounds of the button container (not the entire page).
Clicking the No button triggers a browser alert with the exact message text provided.

You're mine forever! üíñ‚Äù and display the image ‚Äúhappy_propose_day.jpg‚Äù with alt text ‚ÄúHappy Propose Day‚Äù in the output area, then scroll the output area into view with smooth behavior.

The image source resolves to a static frontend asset named exactly ‚Äúhappy_propose_day.jpg‚Äù.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, playful visual theme consistently across the page (colors, typography, spacing, shadows) that fits a ‚ÄúPropose Day Surprise‚Äù vibe, using warm yellows/oranges/pinks/greens (do not introduce a blue/purple primary palette).
acceptanceCriteria: Colors and typography feel consistent and intentionally designed across heading, buttons, and output section.
The primary palette remains warm (yellow/orange/pink/green) and does not shift to a blue/purple-dominant theme.

requirements.text: Add the required static image asset(s) to the frontend and reference them directly from the UI (do not fetch images via the backend). Place generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the UI uses the correct path.
acceptanceCriteria: The image is stored as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The UI references the image via its public URL path and it loads successfully in the browser build.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths (compose them instead if needed).
Do not add additional backend services or external databases; this app can be frontend-only unless a backend becomes necessary.
nonGoals: User accounts or authentication (including Internet Identity).
